p: Once the MICs of the EO and its combinations were identified, data were used to perform time-kill assays to evaluate the antibacterial activity index (E). Each S. aureus strains were faced with different concentrations (0.5 MIC, 1 MIC, 2 MIC, 4 MIC, and 8 MIC) of EO, including the quality control strain S. aureus ATCC 29213 Â®.
